description:
[h2]This is a far less buggy version of its predecessor[/h2]

[h3]Currently Working Features[/h3]
[list]
[*] Load and play challenges from the workshop
[*] Multiplayer well supported
[*] Normal working challenge mode
[*] Mods supported
[/list]

[h3]Planned Features[/h3]
[list]
[*] Scrolling on both menu pages
[*] Working Menu Book
[*] Build/Create Challenges
[*] Integrated "hide and seek" mod
[*] Integration with ChallengeDatabase (coming soon)
[/list]

[h3]Known Bugs[/h3]
[list]
[*] Clients have visible health, although its only a visual glitch
[*] Menu Book not working
[*] No Scrolling on the menu pages
[/list]
name: Modded Challenge Mode
